Package controllers

Class CustomerController

Object
CustomerController
public class CustomerController extends Object
The CustomerController class handles all customer interactions with the system, providing options to check order status, make new orders, and manage carts.

  • Method Details

    • customerMainPage

      public static void customerMainPage(int branchID)
      Displays the main customer interaction page for a specific branch.
      Parameters:
      branchID - The ID of the branch.

    • checkOrderStatus

      private static void checkOrderStatus(int branchID)
      Allows the customer to check the status of an existing order. If the order is ready, the customer can choose to collect the order.
      Parameters:
      branchID - The ID of the branch where the order was placed.

    • customerOrderPage

      private static void customerOrderPage(int branchID)
      Handles the process of placing a new order.
      Parameters:
      branchID - The ID of the branch where the order will be placed.

    • manageCart

      private static void manageCart(int branchID, OrderType orderType, Cart cart)
      Manages the cart operations such as adding, removing, and editing items.
      Parameters:
      branchID - The ID of the branch.
      orderType - The type of the order (Dine-In or Takeaway).
      cart - The cart object containing order items.

    • addItemToCart

      private static void addItemToCart(Cart cart, int branchID)
      Adds an item to the customer's cart.
      Parameters:
      cart - The cart to add items to.
      branchID - The ID of the branch.

    • editCart

      private static void editCart(Cart cart, int branchID)
      Edits an item in the customer's cart.
      Parameters:
      cart - The cart containing the item to edit.
      branchID - The ID of the branch.

    • removeItemFromCart

      private static void removeItemFromCart(Cart cart, int branchID)
      Removes an item from the customer's cart.
      Parameters:
      cart - The cart from which the item will be removed.
      branchID - The ID of the branch.

    • checkoutCart

      private static Boolean checkoutCart(int branchID, OrderType orderType, Cart cart)
      Processes checkout of the cart, handling payment and order finalization.
      Parameters:
      branchID - The ID of the branch.
      orderType - The type of the order (Dine-In or Takeaway).
      cart - The cart to be checked out.
      Returns:
      A Boolean indicating if the checkout was successful.

    • cancelOrder

      private static void cancelOrder(Cart cart, int branchID)
      Cancels the entire order and clears the cart.
      Parameters:
      cart - The cart whose order is to be cancelled.
      branchID - The ID of the branch.

    • displayCart

      private static void displayCart(Cart cart)
      Displays the items in the customer's cart.
      Parameters:
      cart - The cart to display.

    • cardPaymentProcess

      private static PaymentMethod cardPaymentProcess()
      Processes payment using a credit or debit card.
      Returns:
      A PaymentMethod instance if successful, null otherwise.

    • onlinePaymentProcess

      private static PaymentMethod onlinePaymentProcess()
      Processes payment through online payment methods.
      Returns:
      A PaymentMethod instance if successful, null otherwise.
